scripts.package: npm run package-ready && cp chrome/headless_shell.tar.gz dist && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-ready: npm run babel && cp -r package.json dist && cd dist && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 npm install --production
scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist
